Create a Cell Color Pallet for Deconvolution

Source: R/create_cell_colors.R
create_cell_colors.Rd

Create a Cell Color Pallet for Deconvolution

create_cell_colors(
  cell_types = c("Inhib", "Excit", "Astro", "Micro", "Oligo", "OPC"),
  pallet = c("classic", "gg", "tableau"),
  split = NA,
  preview = FALSE
)

Arguments

cell_types

list of cell types
pallet

Choice of base pallet "classic", "gg", or "tableau"
split

delineating character in cell names
preview

plot preview of colors

Value

Examples

create_cell_colors(pallet = "classic")

#>     Inhib     Excit     Astro     Micro     Oligo       OPC 
#> "#E41A1C" "#377EB8" "#4DAF4A" "#984EA3" "#FF7F00" "#FFFF33" 
create_cell_colors(pallet = "classic", preview = TRUE)

#>     Inhib     Excit     Astro     Micro     Oligo       OPC 
#> "#E41A1C" "#377EB8" "#4DAF4A" "#984EA3" "#FF7F00" "#FFFF33" 
create_cell_colors(pallet = "tableau", preview = TRUE)

#>     Inhib     Excit     Astro     Micro     Oligo       OPC 
#> "#1F77B4" "#AEC7E8" "#FF7F0E" "#FFBB78" "#2CA02C" "#98DF8A" 
create_cell_colors(cell_types = c("A.1","A.2", "B.1", "C"), split = "\\.", pallet = "gg",preview = TRUE)

#>         A         B         C       A.1       A.2       B.1 
#> "#F8766D" "#00BA38" "#619CFF" "#F8766D" "#FBBAB5" "#00BA38" 
create_cell_colors(cell_types = c("A.1","A.2", "B.1", "C","D"), pallet = "gg",preview = TRUE)

#>       A.1       A.2       B.1         C         D 
#> "#F8766D" "#A3A500" "#00BF7D" "#00B0F6" "#E76BF3"
